text_sections.section_2: To improve the website, the and set and . In doing so, the DAAD and third parties transfer usage data to is no level of data protection comparable to that under EU law. By clicking the "Accept all" button, you consent to this processing. You can also find selection options and explanations of these cookies and processing at the end of this page under "Cookies". There you can consent at any time with effect for the future.
text_sections.section_11: Rules for the "Study in Germany - Land of Ideas" Campaign's Social Media Channels
text_sections.section_17: NETIQUETTE: RULES FOR THE „STUDY IN GERMANY – LAND OF IDEAS“ CAMPAIGN’S SOCIAL MEDIA CHANNELS
text_sections.section_18: The social media channels for the „Study in Germany – Land of Ideas“ campaign provide information on studying and living in Germany. Our offering is aimed at international students around the world. We are pleased to receive comments and feedback on our posts, but ask that you observe the following rules when posting to our page:
text_sections.section_19: If you are unsure about the content of a post you would like to publish on our social media channels, please send us a direct message. We hope you like our social media channels and are looking forward to your posts and comments!
